item.title: Cybersecurity Resources
item.description:
HELLO WORLD

üõ°Ô∏è Daily Drivers & Learning

  • TryHackMe - Gamified cybersecurity training.
  • Hack The Box - Advanced penetration testing labs.
  • OverTheWire - Great for learning Linux commands via wargames.

üîß Technical Tools

  • CyberChef - The “Cyber Swiss Army Knife” for encoding/decoding.
  • Shodan - Search engine for Internet-connected devices.
  • GTFOBins - Curated list of Unix binaries that can be used to bypass local security.

üìö Documentation & Roadmaps

  • OWASP Top 10 - The standard awareness document for web app security.
  • NIST Cybersecurity Framework - Industry standards for security.

item.title: About to Finish my Degree
item.description:
Thoughts on being a Student

It’s been a journey going to school at Full Sail University as a online student. Having to force myself sometimes to stop what I am doing and sit down and do my homework, or read material.
